title: Login Button Not Responding
step to reproduce: Navigate to login page|Enter username and password|Click login button|Observe button does not respond
description: When clicking the login button, nothing happens. The button appears to be disabled or unresponsive. No error message is displayed.
evidence: SCREENSHOT:https://example.com/screenshots/login-button.png:Screenshot showing login button in unresponsive state
expectedResult: User should be redirected to dashboard after successful login

title: Form Validation Error
step to reproduce: Open registration form|Leave email field empty|Submit form
description: Form submits without validation. Email field is required but form accepts empty value.
evidence: SCREENSHOT:https://example.com/screenshots/form-validation.png:Screenshot showing form submitted with empty email
expectedResult: Form should display validation error for empty email field
